pullRequest.title: Add aggregation factory and remove specialized only the aggregator by…
pullRequest.bodyText:
… value type
This will allow to specialize merge arguments and other methods in the Aggregation by the type of the value recorded.
Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu bogdandrutu@gmail.com

beforeCommit.message:
Add aggregation factory and remove specialized only the aggregator by value type

This will allow to specialize merge arguments and other methods in the Aggregation by the type of the value recorded.

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:

This will allow to specialize merge arguments and other methods in the Aggregation by the type of the value recorded.

nodes.bodyText: I wonder if we could hide the AggregatorFactory on the Aggregation and just have a method like getAggregator() on it directly, so simplify the call chain. I might be missing something, though.
